channel.title: Tags/RTL on Seb Hirsch - Motion Design & Visual Effects

item.title: Keep it in the Family
item.description: Created the title design and 3D motion graphics for the German version of the popular game show Keep it in the Family.

item.title: Bülent gegen Chris (Wollen wir wetten?!)
item.description: Designed the title sequence and on-screen graphics for the celebrity competition show Bülent gegen Chris (Wollen wir wetten?!).
